p: In addition to country emission budgets when applying different equity interpretations and weights, we calculate the combination of equality, responsibility, and capability weightings which minimize (a) the sum of squared changes in per capita country budgets from their maximum possible allowance to the commonly-weighted level, or (b) the sum of squared changes from the original 2018 ESR agreement to the common weighting. This minimization is calculated for all potential combinations of equity interpretations (4 capability × 3 equality × 5 responsibility = 60 combinations).
